## R Markdown

```{r csv}
locations <- read_csv("/cloud/project/Test/BRSPackage/inst/extdata/raw_data/All_Locations.csv")
aux <- read_csv("AuxDataErrorStructure.csv") %>%
  mutate(date_time = as.POSIXct(paste(Date, as.character(Time)), format = "%m/%d/%y %H:%M:%S"))
aux %>%
  select(date_time)
```
